name: Watcher's Woods
description:
Watcher's Woods is a game made in 3 days for PegJam 2018, where the theme was "Small Gods". As the watcher, you must speak with the souls lost in the woods and guide them to their final resting places. The game is endless, new souls will continue to enter the woods as long as you continue playing.

Controls:

  • Move with WASD
  • Interact/Speak with Space
  • Rotate camera with Q and E

Team:

  • Code by @graebor
  • Art by @amymja
  • Sound by @julianbeutel

In addition to the original art Amy did over the weekend, we used some assets from her Spooky Forest pack to fill out the world. Special thanks to attendees of PegJam for lending their voices to Julian for sound effects! You can also listen to the music from the game here.
